title: Support optional inputs in RNN case
body_html:
Add logic which handles the cases where optional inputs are omitted.

This change helps us pass onnx backend test cases.

However, we still have some issue with LSTM and GRU.
I don't have enough time to fix them right now.

@anderspapitto could you take a look? To reproduce the problem, just simply remove https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/python/onnx/tests/onnx_backend_test.py#L34 and https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/python/onnx/tests/onnx_backend_test.py#L36

body:
Add logic which handles the cases where optional inputs are omitted.

This change helps us pass onnx backend test cases.

However, we still have some issue with LSTM and GRU.
I don't have enough time to fix them right now.

@anderspapitto could you take a look? To reproduce the problem, just simply remove https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/python/onnx/tests/onnx_backend_test.py#L34 and https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/caffe2/python/onnx/tests/onnx_backend_test.py#L36
